turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order a pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need four medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the first pizza, I want barbecue chicken. On the second pizza, I'd like a supreme. On the third pizza, I would like Hawaiian. And on the fourth pizza, I just want cheese and pepperoni, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, what type of crust would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Same crust, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the supreme pizza only comes in thick crust, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I'd like to change the pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like instead?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take a thin crust sausage pizza, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. Any special instructions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 medium pizzas, a bbq chicken, sausage, a hawaiian and pepperoni. All of them are thin crust. Is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, the total is $45.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. Your pizzas will be ready for pickup at bella lunas in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, have a good day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you too, bye.
